hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:Allah's Messenger (S) said: "Allah, Blessed and Exalted is He, descends to the earth's heaven every night when the first third of the night has passed. He says: "I am the Sovereign. Is there any who calls upon Me so that I may respond to him? Is there any who asks of Me that I may give him? Is there any who seeks forgiveness from Me so that I may forgive him?' He continues in that until the illumination of Al-Fajr

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي نُزُولِ الرَّبِّ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ إِلَى السَّمَاءِ الدُّنْيَا كُلَّ لَيْلَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: [What Had Been Related] About The Lord Blessed And Exalted Is He, Descending To The Earth's Heaven Every Night
